name: Car Jump Challenge
description:
Jump over various obstacles to reach the finish line.
There are many challenging levels waiting for you.
Activate platform triggers to complete levels.

KEY FEATURES


  • 2D platform arcade game
  • 24 levels ready to be unlocked
  • 2 cars with different parameters
  • realistically behaving suspension of 2D vehicles
  • moving platforms, sinkholes, barrels, crates, tunnels
  • puzzles to solve to unlock levels
  • challenging time limits prepared for the most persistent players
